description: This file defines a FavoritesProvider class for managing favorite songs in a Flutter application, utilizing shared preferences for persistent storage.

classes.name: FavoritesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages favorite song IDs and persists them using shared preferences.

methods.name: loadFavorites
methods.description: Loads favorite song IDs from shared preferences and updates the internal set.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Adds or removes a song's ID from favorites and updates shared preferences.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if a given song is marked as favorite.
